name: Hardware Repair and Replacement
description: This involves fixing or replacing faulty hardware components such as hard drives, memory modules, graphics cards, motherboards, and power supplies.

name: Software Troubleshooting
description: IT professionals diagnose and resolve software-related issues, including operating system errors, driver problems, and software conflicts. They can also help with software installation, updates, and configuration.

name: Virus and Malware Removal
description: IT experts can detect and remove viruses, spyware, and other malicious software from computers and networks to ensure data security.
